channel.title: NSE:IIB on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Troubled Indian Lender IndusInd Taps Veteran Anand as Next CEO
item.description: Embattled IndusInd Bank Ltd. appointed veteran banker Rajiv Anand as its chief executive officer, filling a key vacancy as the Indian lender seeks to recover from suspected fraud and accounting issues

item.title: Troubled Indian Lender IndusInd Taps Veteran Anand as Next CEO
item.description: Embattled IndusInd Bank Ltd. appointed veteran banker Rajiv Anand as its chief executive officer, filling a key vacancy as the Indian lender seeks to recover from suspected fraud and accounting issues
